message.name: ERR_RESOURCES_DRE_NAME
message.locale: Resource with name "%1s" at specified location already exists.

message.name: ERR_RESOURCES_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Resource name cannot be empty. Please enter a valid Resource name.

message.name: ERR_RESOURCES_MRE
message.locale: More than one resource with the same name at the same location found in database.

message.name: ERR_RESOURCES_XRV_UPDATE
message.locale: Cannot update type/status of resource "%1s" as it is assigned as a default printer to organization unit or user.
Cannot update type/status of resource "%1s" as it is assigned as a default printer to organisation unit or user.

message.name: ERR_RESOURCES_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Resource with this name already exists.
